Articles.Content: My mind has been blown.

I knew what this thread was about before I opened it, and there is a rational explanation: He's not scared, he's just disappointed that you broke the craft (you did make something go BOOM, right?) which means that it won't be as good at getting him into space anymore.
Nope, he's scared. He wouldn't be thrashing around and yelling at me to "GET HIM OUTTA HERE"
Even Jeb recognises that explosions on his ship aren't generally a good thing. But someone forgot to give him the memo that overheating boosters make the best decouplers.
It can't be! Well, unless he ran out of snacks.
Maybe he's just upset that there's no IVA for the mk2 cockpit, so he can't see out.
Are they ever going to make an IVA for the other cockpits or just let modders do it?
He's just remembered he left the car in the 'short term' carpark and will be bankrupt by the time he gets back.

Maybe he's just upset that there's no IVA for the mk2 cockpit, so he can't see out.

That always upsets me too...
Maybe its just disappointment because nothing blew up....

Maybe he's just upset that there's no IVA for the mk2 cockpit, so he can't see out.
Technically, there is, it's just boring. The Science Lab, on the other hand, truly has no IVA, which means you don't even see the Kerbal heads for Kerbals in the lab.

this should be a "caption this pic" thread

ie

Whadda ya mean the rocket isn't safe.. it has a seat-belt doesn't it?
I think he knows that it was me who built the very expensive bomb he is sitting on top of.
Yeah, I think that's his "You forgot the snacks!?!?!" face.
Oh yeah, i remember. Forgot the snacks. On a rover. I'l just refill it.

I like this guy's awareness:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

From now on I'm sending HIM to the most prestigious missions.

Even Jeb can get scared of explosions. Especially when he's alone.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Maybe he forgot the cheese?

He's just remembered he left the car in the 'short term' carpark and will be bankrupt by the time he gets back.

That made me think of this picture. He kinda looks like he just realized that he forgot to do something important that he should've done before he left.
I thought he passed some gas in his Cockpit?

I thought he passed some gas in his Cockpit?

Long term missions are a demon

Oh, and Jeb's face is essentially mine throughout my first Duna mission.

Except he had my favorite Kerbal (Take a guess...) with him who said "SHUT UP MAN MISSION CONTROL'S TRAINED FOR THIS. Wait, you are trained for this right?

Oh dear"

That made me think of this picture. He kinda looks like he just realized that he forgot to do something important that he should've done before he left.

http://www.outerspaceuniverse.org/media/astronaut-on-moon.jpg

His taxes maybe, didn't one of the Apollo astronauts get a pardon from the IRS while he was "out of the country?"

Here's the trio going from terror to elation in 3 seconds:

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/pz6bp/embed"></iframe>

I mean... C'MON MAN

THERE AREN'T ANY PARACHUTES ON THAT THING

AND NO HEAT SHIELD! YOU'VE ALREADY LOST MORE THAN 75% OF THE SHIP!

ARE YOU NOT EVEN THE SLIGHTEST BIT CONCERNED?

guess not...

Long term missions are a demon

Oh, and Jeb's face is essentially mine throughout my first Duna mission.

Except he had my favorite Kerbal (Take a guess...) with him who said "SHUT UP MAN MISSION CONTROL'S TRAINED FOR THIS. Wait, you are trained for this right?

Oh dear"

Hahaha! love that humor!
